summary: Honest Plush Brannon is a con-man thrown out of the Barbary Coast in San Francisco in the 1880s and headed for the gold rush region of Nevada. He discovers a real mine which lead to several complications.
cast: Wallace Beery|Binnie Barnes|John Carradine|Bruce Kellogg|Frances Rafferty|Chill Wills|Noah Beery|Henry O'Neill|Ray Collins|Morris Ankrum|Donald Meek|Addison Richards|Harry Hayden|Paul E. Mitchell|Kansas Moehring|Skeets Noyes|Robert Emmett O'Connor|Anne O'Neal|Jerry O'Neil|Lee Phelps|John Phipps|George Reed|Charles Regan|Al Rhein|Robert Robinson|Earl Schenck|Phil Schumacher|Harry Shannon|Walter Soderling|Steve Stephens|Ferris Taylor|Fred 'Snowflake' Toones|Eddy Waller|Tiny Ward
title: Barbary Coast Gent
